title: Fix article submission on Admin page

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the article submission flow so that admins can successfully add new articles. The form on the Admin page must submit article data (title, content, category, image, author, etc.) to the backend without errors, and the newly created article must appear in the article list after submission.

quotes: I am unable to add article

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can fill out the article submission form and click submit without encountering an error.
On successful submission, the new article appears in the article list on the Admin page.
Backend addArticle (or equivalent) function accepts the submitted data and stores it correctly.
Any validation errors in the form are surfaced clearly to the user.
No console errors or unhandled promise rejections occur during article submission.

constraints: Do not change the overall article data schema unless strictly required to fix the submission bug.
Preserve the 7-day article expiry logic already in place.
nonGoals: Adding new article fields not already part of the schema.
Changes to the review or user profile features.
UI redesign of the Admin page beyond what is needed to fix submission.
